title: Interactive Usability Evaluation of LLMs in Cybersecurity
description: Develop an interactive framework for evaluating the usability of LLMs in cybersecurity, focusing on their ability to engage with and respond to cyber threats.
motivation: LLMs have potential in cybersecurity, but their interactive usability and effectiveness in real-world scenarios are not well understood. A focused evaluation can enhance their application in this critical field.
questions: How can interactive frameworks improve the usability of Large Language Models (LLMs) in identifying and responding to cybersecurity threats?
What are the key usability challenges faced when implementing LLMs in cybersecurity contexts, and how can these be addressed through an interactive evaluation framework?
In what ways do different interactive evaluation methods affect the performance and reliability of LLMs in real-time cybersecurity threat scenarios?
